News.headline: Loan Update: 29th December
News.short_description: Defender Jimmy Shepherd made his debut for Billericay Town on Boxing Day, after signing on a one month loan last week.
News.description:
The defender got off to winning start as Billericay won 2-1 away from home against Canvey Island with Shepherd playing the full 90 minutes.

Forward Christian Assombalonga also made his debut for St Albans City after coming on as a substitute in the 74th minute for their game against Oxford City FC on Boxing Day

St Albans City lost the game 4-2 with former Dagger Jamie Cureton getting the two goals for St Albans City.

Barkingside loanees, goalkeeper Joe carter and forward Jakub Berkowicz didn’t play over the Christmas period as Barkingside haven’t had a fixture since December 17th.
